result.title: Help in overcoming wrong answer for INCSEQ on SPOJ
result.content:
Hi friends,

I am solving this problem. Here is my code:

		int n = reader.readInt();
		int k = reader.readInt();
		int[] val = new int[n];
		int c0 = 0;
		int mxv = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < val.length; i++) {
			val[i] = reader.readInt();
			if (val[i] == 0) {
				c0++;
			}
			if (val[i] > mxv) {
				mxv = val[i];
			}
		}
		int[][] dp = new int[n][k];
		int[] num = new int[mxv + 1];
		int mod = 5000000;
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			dp[i - 1][0] = 1;
		}
		num[0] = c0;
		for (int j = 2; j <= k; j++) {
			for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
				if (val[i - 2] > 0) {
					int tmp = val[i - 2];
					while (tmp < num.length) {
						num[tmp] += dp[i - 2][j - 2];
						if (num[tmp] >= mod) {
							num[tmp] -= mod;
						}
						tmp += (tmp & -tmp);
					}
				}
				int tmp = val[i - 1] - 1;
				int sum = num[0];
				while (tmp > 0) {
					sum += num[tmp];
					if (sum >= mod) {
						sum -= mod;
					}
					tmp -= (tmp & -tmp);
				}
				dp[i - 1][j - 1] = sum;
			}
			Arrays.fill(num, 0);
		}
		int sum = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			sum += dp[i - 1][k - 1];
			if (sum >= mod) {
				sum -= mod;
			}
		}
		writer.println(sum);

I get wrong answer. Where am I going wrong. Any help will be appreciated.
